name: Magic ＋
description:
"I can read your mind!" is a magical app for iPad, iPhone and iPod touch.
Through six questions, you can read the magical number in your friend's mind.

How to perform:
1. Show this app to your friend, and ask him to think of a number between 1 and 60.
2. You can say something to distract your friend.
3. This app will show you six magic cards.
4. Ask your friend if his magical number is on the card.
5. Finally, the magical number will be revealed automatically.

Secret tutorial movie contained in the app can also be seen the demo movie on YouTube.
Demo moive - http://jasonworkshop.com/movie/magic

Enjoy this trick that has taken in many experienced magicians!
